name: Anthony Colle
profile: Enthusiastic and curious Software Developer with a background in Digital Marketing, including SEO, UX and Big Data analysis.

I hold a Higher Diploma in Computer Science in Software Development (1st Class Honours) from National College of Ireland, as well as a Masterâ€™s in Management (specialised in Digital Marketing) from DCU Business School.
The MERN stack is my go-to stack for prototyping and developing, that is, React.js, Node.js with Express.js and MongoDB.
Other technologies I work with include Angular, Java, RESTful APIs, relational databases with MySQL, Bash Scripting, Ansible, PL/SQL, Python, R and version control tool Git.

On my spare time, I enjoy creative coding with tools like Processing or p5js, and I'm currently diving into C++ to be exposed to a lower level language, and get a better understanding of computer graphics.
Excellent communicator & collaborator, familiar with Agile methodologies, and proven record of successfully building & delivering enterprise level products & applications.

skills.name: React.js
skills.description: Designed and developed multiple modern applications with React.js, using the latest APIs such as Hooks and Context. In-depth understanding of props, state management, lifecycle methods and advanced concepts like Higher-Order Components or Props Rendering.

skills.name: Angular
skills.description: Developed several CRUD apps using the Angular framework. Integrated services, authentication guards and request interceptors. Comfortable with Typescript.

skills.name: Node.js, Express.js & MongoDB
skills.description: Worked on multiple applications using this stack with either React or Angular to develop the front-end, or with template engines such as Pug, Mustache or EJS. Projects include secure REST APIs for CRUD operations with both JWT and session authentication, integration of 3rd Party APIs such as Stripe for payment processing, and implementation of the WebSocket protocol to develop real-time applications.

skills.name: JavaScript
skills.description: Strong skills in JavaScript, both inside and outside the browser, and in asynchronous and event-driven programming. Experienced with the main ES6, ES7 & ES8 features, such as arrow functions, new loops iterators, promises, async/await constructions & destructuring patterns.

skills.name: Java
skills.description: Worked on multiple projects using Servlets, advanced data structures, sorting and searching algorithms and RESTful APIs using JAX-RS and Hibernate for data persistence. Good fundamentals of Object-Oriented and algorithm design, problem solving & complexity analysis.

skills.name: HTML/CSS
skills.description: Great knowledge of the structure and workflow of websites and web applications. Thriving for good design, and ensuring fully responsiveness of the UI. Familiar with CSS animations, SCSS/SASS & BEM syntax.

skills.name: Python
skills.description: Python was the fist language I learnt when I started programming. I used it mostly for Statistical Analysis and training Machine Learning models (regression, classification, & reinforcement).

skills.name: Linux Server Administration & Bash Scripting
skills.description: Experience with administrating Linux servers, and writing shell scripts.

skills.name: RDBMS, SQL & PL/SQL
skills.description: In-depth understanding of the relational model of datasets, including Primary and Foreign keys, normalisation, stored procedure and triggers, to ensure the integrity of business data at all times. Ability to design, create and query databases using advanced SQL queries and PL/SQL scripts.

education.degree: Higher Diploma in Computer Sciences (Software Development)

modules: Marketing Strategies & Metrics, Applied Web Design & Development

education.degree: B.Sc. in Management, Economics and Social

functions: Worked with Allied Irish Banks (AIB) as an ETL developer, mapping and validating data for regulatory reports on credit institutions to be submitted to the Central Bank of Ireland (CBI) and to the European Central Bank (ECB).
Designed and developed a React/Spring web application for Wipro Project Managers to monitor all ongoing projects with AIB.
Currently working as a System Administrator on AIB Linux servers, deploying new applications on them, and supporting them in case of failure.
Coaching and mentoring newer members of the team
Ensured the team functioned optimally and produced reports of the highest possible quality
Continually enhanced the client-facing aspects of the team's performance.
Deepening and broadening the skills base and workflow of the team
Pilot project to provide global market and customer intelligence support to Google teams
Researched, analysed and synthetised data into actionable insights to improve Google's value proposition
Optimised workflow and internal processes to scale up the programme
Managed requests from clients in a timely manner, ensuring growing satisfaction and engagement
Management of a 6-month project for an Irish SaaS start-up in the 3D rendering industry
Conducted a market research to identify and understand the company's key business challenges
Designed and implemented both the inbound (email, blogging, social media, webinar) and outbound (AdWords and other Paid Advertising) marketing campaigns.

projects.name: Chat Application
projects.description: A chat application built on Node.js with Express and Socket.IO. Users select a username and a chat room where they can then chat with all the other users currently in it

projects.name: Expense Tracker
projects.description: An application built with React that lets users track their expenses. Authentication is handled with Firebase, state management with Redux and testing with Enzyme

projects.name: Weather Forecast
projects.description: A Node.js application built with Express that gives weather forecast. It uses the Mapbox API to get coordinates based on location and the Darksky API to provide the actual forecast based on latitude and longitude

projects.name: Loading Spinner
projects.description: A simple loading spinner implemented in React. The loading spinner is displayed once the client makes a request to the server which takes 4 seconds to complete. Once completed, the spinner disappear to show the response from the server

projects.name: Virtual Rendering
projects.description: A React implementation of Virtual Rendering to prevent slow and laggy scrolling of large lists. Virtual Rendering is implemented using react-virtualized and avatars are provided by DiceBear Avatars.
